entity.name: Asutosh Rath
entity.description: Engineer at ExxonMobil, NITK Surathkal graduate. Building open hardware for environmental monitoring. Experience with Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and 3D printing.

projects.name: Project Vaayu
projects.description: Open-source air quality monitor for India. Affordable (₹5,000), accurate (±10%), portable. Uses PMS5003 sensor + ESP32-C3 with auto-calibration against government CPCB stations. No app needed — just plug in and read AQI on display. Fully open: hardware, firmware, enclosure STLs.
